doc.previous: Patronage was never far away In the early 1920s Leopold Stokowski gave Stravinsky regular support through a pseudonymous benefactor 47
doc.after: Stravinsky met Vera de Bosset in Paris in February 1921 48 while she was married to the painter and stage designer Serge Sudeikin and they began an affair that led to Vera leaving her husband 49
